full_text.full_text:
(Ex) Market Basket Analysis
▪ We are given point-of-sale 
data collected at the checkout 
counters of a grocery store
▪ Association analysis can be 
applied to find items that are 
frequently bought together
– (ex) {Diapers} → {Milk}
▪ This types of rule can be used 
to identify potential cross-
selling opportunities among 
related items 
36
